DOC.brief_title: Low-volume Polyethylene Glycol Bowel Preparation Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: In-hospital patient randomly assign one three group : group 1 single dose ( PEG-3350 ; PEG-4 L day previous study , start 17:00 finish 21:00 h ) ; group 2 : split-dose ( PEG-3350 ; 2 L day 17:00-19:00 h 2 L day procedure 06:00-08:00 ) ; group 3 : low-volume 2 L PEG-solution ( day procedure 06:00-08:00 ) . The quality colonic preparation assess Boston bowel preparation scale ( 13 ) ; tolerability ( nausea , vomit , abdominal pain ) , compliance , sleep disturbance adverse effect group 3 compare group 1 2 . The time since last dose bowel-preparation agent , time since last solid food consume , approximate amount bowel preparation take ( 0 % , 25 % , 75 % , 100 % ) , start time colonoscopy record . Satisfactory colon preparation consider score Boston bowel preparation scale 2/3 ; otherwise , procedure consider unsatisfactory preparation .
